title: Estimated number of World of Warcraft subscribers 2015 to 2023
summary: The statistic shows the World Warcraft of World Warcraft from 2015 to 2023 .
In 2018 , the World Warcraft number World Warcraft amounted to about 5.67 millions .
World Warcraft is a global pharmaceutical and biotech company , headquartered in London .
gold: How many people play World of Warcraft ? In 2015 , when Activision Blizzard last reported on WoW 's subscriptions , the game had 5.5 million global subscribers.
It is projected that the numbers will be gradually decreasing to reach 4.46 million in 2023.
The game reached the peak of its popularity in the second half of 2010 , when Activision Blizzard 's estimates put the global number of WoW subscribers at 12 million .
